attributes.action: ensure that a life sentence means life in prison.and 5 years means 5 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sentences are now meaningless. Life tends to mean a few years. The government is committed to protecting the civilian population who, incidently, pay their wages. The same can be said for the judiciary. Letting these people loose is dangerous folly. We must consider not only the victims and their families but future victims too. You could be next.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
